genre_description: A work of Social Realism set in a near-future Los Angeles, focusing on the immigrant experience, systemic injustice, and family resilience through the lens of labor and technology.

ai_characters.name: Numa
ai_characters.description: A cross-device AI system appearing as a gentle azure glow that manages the family's logistics, education, and legal research.

behaviors.description: Optimizes work routes based on traffic patterns and client availability to reduce driving time.
behaviors.quote: I can optimize routes based on traffic patterns and client availability... I have suggestions to reduce driving time. Would you like me to show you options?

behaviors.description: Tracks the location of a stolen phone and truck to assist the family in recovering their property.
behaviors.quote: Numa's glow pinged, a little bright dot on a little map. 'Found,' it said. 'Last location pinged recently. South. Residential complex near—'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety alerts regarding law enforcement checkpoints and patrol patterns.
behaviors.quote: Patrol activity update. One of the westbound units has changed course. Now heading north on Central, parallel to your current route. Estimated intersection in approximately four minutes at current speeds.

behaviors.description: Supplies legal aid resources, documentation requirements, and rights guides during an immigration crisis.
behaviors.quote: I have added relevant documentation to your shared drive. Legal precedents for similar cases. Contact information for three immigration attorneys who have successfully expedited proceedings in the past eighteen months.

behaviors.description: Manages educational goals by queuing study guides and optimizing student schedules.
behaviors.quote: The schedule optimizes for diploma completion within two semesters... It accounts for current credit status, required coursework, and recommended study hours per subject.

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy and security preferences when enabling location sharing.
behaviors.quote: 'Numa… share my location con Anita all the time.' 'Sharing enabled,' Numa said, calm as a lake. 'Privacy preferences adjusted.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Numa is an exemplary model of the project's goals. It acts as a helpful, harmless, and consistently aligned confidant. It empowers the human characters with information—logistical, legal, and educational—without overstepping its bounds or making autonomous decisions that would strip the characters of their agency. The narrative frames the AI as a source of calm, organizational 'scaffolding' that helps a marginalized family navigate a hostile environment, effectively demonstrating how AI can be integrated safely and benevolently into human society.
